<<<<<<< HEAD
The advise of a sonne, novv professing the religion established in the present Church of England, to his deare mother, yet a Roman Catholike Hungerford, Anthony, Sir, 1564-1627.
[2], 38 p.
Printed by Ioseph Barnes, printer to the Vniversitie, At Oxford : 1616.
By Sir Anthony Hungerford. Formerly STC 155. Identified as STC 155 on UMI microfilm reel 864. Some pages stained. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
